column2: "Hey there. It's not a hell of a lot, but I put together a little something for you."
"A warm welcome to a newly arrived Meteorn. It's a bit of a Halphian tradition."
"It's not everyone, but I had some of the Aelio Town residents join us."
"I sure have taken a liking to it. Makes me want to protect this place and everyone in it."
"It's the name of the defenders that fight against the DOLLS."
"I, as well as Manon, are both members of ARKS. Aina's training to become one."
"You looked like you were handling yourself pretty well against that Pedas Sword before I showed up."
"I welcome anyone who can adapt that quickly."
"I was thinking about asking you to join us--to become a member of ARKS yourself."
"Hehe, ah, not right this instant, of course. After you've gotten used to your new life, just give it some thought."
"Anyways, let's call it a night, hey?"
"Not good... The one from earlier must have been a scout."
